definition: to scale (a height)/to ascend/to mount/to publish or record/to enter (e.g. in a register)/to press down with the foot/to step or tread on/to put on (shoes or trousers) (dialect)/to be gathered and taken to the threshing ground (old)
animal hide/leather/to reform/to remove/to expel (from office)
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

pinyin: chu1 xue4 xing4 deng1 ge2 re4

sentences.english: There is no vaccine to protect against dengue.
sentences.chinese: 目前尚沒有預防登革熱的疫苗。

sentences.english: The clinical features of dengue fever vary according to the age of the patient.
sentences.chinese: 患者年齡不同，登革熱的臨牀特點也不同。

sentences.english: What is dengue and how is it treated?
sentences.chinese: 什麼是登革熱以及如何治療？

sentences.english: Most people infected with a dengue virus have no symptoms or a mild fever.
sentences.chinese: 大多數感染登革熱病毒的人沒有症狀或者輕微發燒。

sentences.english: Insect-borne diseases like dengue fever, tick-borne encephalitis and malaria will spread.
sentences.chinese: 蟲媒傳染病，如登革熱，森林腦炎，瘧疾正在蔓延。

sentences.english: He says malaria and dengue are among the greatest public health concerns.
sentences.chinese: 他說，瘧疾和登革熱是對公共衛生的最大威脅。

sentences.english: Dengue is spread through the bite of infected mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 登革熱是經由帶病毒的蚊蟲叮咬進行傳播的。

sentences.english: But the mosquito that spreads dengue, Aedes aegypti, is most active during the day.
sentences.chinese: 但蚊子傳播登革熱的埃及伊蚊，是最活躍的白天。

sentences.english: Cuban authorities are on a fumigation campaign to prevent dengue fever.
sentences.chinese: 古巴政府正在進行噴灑計畫以預防登革熱。

sentences.english: About two fifths of the world's population are now at risk.
sentences.chinese: 現在，約有五分之二世界人口面臨登革熱的危險。

sentences.english: Dengue is present in sub-Saharan Africa but often unrecognized.
sentences.chinese: 登革熱存在於撒哈拉以南非洲，但往往識別不到。

sentences.english: Once a dengue vaccine is available there will be a great demand.
sentences.chinese: 登革熱疫苗一旦可用，需求會很大。

sentences.english: Dengue fever is an acute communicable disease caused by virus.
sentences.chinese: 登革熱是一種由過濾性病毒所引起的急性傳染病。

sentences.english: Dengue viruses are transmitted to humans through the bites of infective female Aedes mosquitoes.
sentences.chinese: 登革熱病毒通過傳染性雌性伊蚊的叮咬傳染給人類。

sentences.english: Strengthening disease surveillance for epidemic-prone diseases including malaria and dengue fever.
sentences.chinese: 加強對流行性疾病，包括瘧疾和登革熱的疾病監測。

sentences.english: Dengue fever is sometimes called" break-bone fever."
sentences.chinese: 登革熱有時也被稱爲骨痛熱。

definition: to make a definite diagnosis/confirmed (case of a specific disease)
health bureau (or office, or department, or agency)
to be on guard/wariness/to guard against/preventive
